title: Lucretia: A Play in Verse
description: A play in five acts, written as an Elizabethan-style, historical drama, 'Lucretia: A Play in Verse' is the dramatic story of the infamous Borgias, focusing on the life of Lucretia Borgia, daughter of Pope Alexander VI. The play is the precursor to the historical fiction novel 'Lucretia', also by David Krae.This edition of the play includes a special foreword by the author.
author: David Krae
